title: what is better, a 3150IP champ or a 4800IP champ or just save up for 6300IP cha,p (ornn is no worth)
body:
so i recently got enough ip to get a champ up to 4800IP, and i really want to make my time's worth (2 weeks of farming). now my problem is that i recently just ditched support as my main role because i wanted to carry and feel like i am helping the team, and supports are just supposed to heal and shield people (it gets boring). i am currently roless, play whatever the team wants me to play (i was blessed, 2 times in a row top! and that never happens). the thing is, i already own 2 3150ip champs ( {{champion:53}} {{champion:29}} ) and i want to expand. 

now from what i've seen is that there are a shit ton of 6300ip champions that seem fun and sometimes easy (shockingly {{champion:266}}, {{champion:201}}  big hearty guy, {{champion:427}}, {{champion:268}} , {{champion:432}},  {{champion:48}} and {{champion:222}} ) and also 4800IP champs like {{champion:143}}, {{champion:115}} (he is fun, i love to play him, and fucking pain in the ass), {{champion:69}} , {{champion:110}} ,{{champion:96}} , {{champion:57}} , {{champion:61}} , {{champion:68}}  and so many more

now of course, people like {{champion:4}}  i am also intrested in. so, what price range offers the most versatility, utility, and meta? please tell me.
